element.name: Additional Transport Mode Descriptors
element.definition: The documentation of transport mode techniques for this EMS response.
element.v3Comment: Information now split between eDisposition.17 (Transport Mode from Scene) and eDisposition.18 (Additional Transport Mode Descriptors). Element eDisposition.18 (Additional Transport Mode Descriptors) has been added to document the use of lights and sirens or other descriptive information.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Intersection Navigation-With Automated Light Changing Technology

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Initial No Lights or Sirens, Upgraded to Lights and Sirens

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Initial Lights and Sirens, Downgraded to No Lights or Sirens
